title: account banned for no reason?
body: got on last night it was fine didn't play. last time I played was 9/15. try to get on today and my account is banned? I'm confused here.

replies.body: Hey!  It looks we noticed suspicious activity on the account so we applied a security lock for your protection.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help out!
Did they tell you the reason why you got banned ?
no, they said they send me an email but there is no email from them.
no, they said go to my email but there is no email from them.
